name: Japan Data Catalog for the Humanities and Social Sciences (JDCat)
description: JDCat compiles metadata (e.g., information on authors and time periods) provided by research institutes participating in this program. Through cross-sectorial data search, JDCat facilitates access to a wide variety of humanities and social sciences data held by these research institutes.
owner_name: Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS)
